Requirements Your target can't be more than one size larger than you.

With a surge of aura power, you impose your will upon a foe—or even something they hold—turning raw essence into force. You may attempt the following maneuvers using an Aura-Control check instead of Athletics.

Trip

You attempt to knock a creature to the ground. Attempt an @Check[aura-control|against:reflex|rollerRole:origin] against the target’s Reflex DC.

  • Critical Success: The target falls, landing @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and takes @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage.

  • Success: The target falls and lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

  • Critical Failure: You lose control of your aura, rendering you unable to use aura-control abilities for 1 round.

Shove

You push a creature away from you. Attempt an @Check[aura-control|against:fortitude|rollerRole:origin] against the target’s Fortitude DC.

  • Critical Success: You push the target up to 10 feet away.

  • Success: You push the target 5 feet away.

  • Critical Failure: You lose control of your aura, rendering you unable to use aura-control abilities for 1 round.

Disarm

You try to knock an item from a creature’s grasp. Attempt an @Check[aura-control|against:reflex|rollerRole:origin] against the target’s Reflex DC.

  • Critical Success: The target drops the item, which lands in its space.

  • Success: You loosen the target’s grip. Future attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} that item gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and the target takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attacks with the item or other checks requiring a firm grasp on it. The creature can end this effect by Interacting to change its grip; otherwise, it lasts as long as the creature holds the item.

  • Critical Failure: You lose control of your aura, rendering you unable to use aura-control abilities for 1 round.

Range:

  • Expert: 30 feet.

  • Master: 60 feet.

  • Legendary: 90 feet.

Aura-Attack: actions with this trait are subject to a multiple aura-attack penatly accumulated during a turn.
